references.reason: This paper introduces Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO), a core algorithm studied and analyzed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Understanding and preventing capacity loss in reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of capacity loss, which the current paper connects to representation collapse in PPO.

references.paper_title: Implicit under-parameterization inhibits data-efficient deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of representation collapse which is studied in the current paper in relation to PPO.

references.paper_title: Maintaining Plasticity in Deep Continual Learning
references.reason: This paper discusses the loss of plasticity in deep reinforcement learning, an issue connected to the representation collapse described in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Loss of plasticity in continual deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper studies the loss of plasticity in continual deep reinforcement learning, which is connected to the representation issues observed in the current work.
